info.title: One Auto API
info.description: Subscribe and generate an api key on our website: [https://www.oneautoapi.com](https://www.oneautoapi.com)

get.description: This endpoint predicts the number of years a vehicle will remain on the road.

success.description: Whether the api call was successful

years_left_prediction.description: The number of predicted years vehicle will remain on the road.

prediction_string.description: The predicted year range the vehicle will remain on the road.

one_year_prediction.description: The percentage likelihood of the vehicle lasting the next 12 months.

error.example: If there is an error the message would go here
error.description: Details of what went wrong with the api call

get.description: This endpoint provides manufacturer and model statistics to predict how long the vehicle is likely to remain on the road. This endpoint provides manufacturer and model statistics to predict how long the vehicle is likely to remain on the road.

success.description: Whether the api call was successful

manufacturer_average_final_miles.description: The average number of final miles vehicles of this manufacturer complete.

model_average_final_miles.description: The average number of final miles vehicles of this model type completes.

manufacturer_average_final_age.description: The average final age of vehicles of this manufacturer.

model_average_final_age.description: The average final age of vehicles of this model.

manufacturer_model_year_initially_regist.description: The number of vehicles of this manufacturer and model year initially registered.

manufacturer_model_year_currently_licens.description: The number of vehicles of this manufacturer and model year currently licenced.

manufacturer_model_year_currently_sorn.description: The number of vehicles of this manufacturer and model year currently SORN.

manufacturer_model_year_percentage_left.description: The percentage of vehicles of this manufacturer and model year that remain on the road.

error.example: If there is an error the message would go here
error.description: Details of what went wrong with the api call

get.description: This endpoint provides metrics about market supply, advert age and price movements.

success.description: Whether the api call was successful

region.description: Region of the country the data applies to.

average_advert_days.description: Average number of days vehicles of this model have been advertised for.

average_advert_miles_per_month.description: Average monthly mileage of vehicles of this model advertised within this region.

average_advert_price_change.description: Average change to the advertised price for this model within the last 7 days and within this region.

average_manufacturer_miles_per_month.description: Average monthly mileage of vehicles from this manufacturer.

average_model_range_miles_per_month.description: Average monthly miles advertised vehicles of this model range have completed.

average_model_miles_per_month.description: Average monthly miles advertised vehicles of this model have completed.

min_advert_price.description: Minimum advertised price for this model.

max_advert_price.description: Maximum advertised price for this model.

min_advert_mileage.description: Minimum advertised price for this model.

max_advert_mileage.description: Maximum advertised price for this model.

weekly_advert_qty_change.description: Maximum advertised price for this model.

advert_qty.description: Number of adverts matching the query parameters.

average_advert_owners_per_annum.description: Average number of keepers per annum for this model.

min_advert_previous_owners.description: Minimum number of previous keepers for advertised models.

max_advert_previous_owners.description: Maximum number of previous keepers for advertised models.

count.description: Number of vehicles of this colour advertised.

desirability_rating.description: 0-100 value indicative of retail demand for the vehicle where 0 is low and 100 is high.

desirability_rating_last_month.description: 0-100 value indicative of average desirability rating for the past month, which when compared to today's desirability rating allows users to see the trend

error.example: If there is an error the message would go here
error.description: Details of what went wrong with the api call

get.description: This endpoint returns a true/false identifier confirming whether the vehicle has been used as a taxi or private hire vehicle. If the vehicle has been previously used as a taxi or private hire vehicle, then make, model, fuel type, licence start & end date, whether the vehicle is wheelchair adapted and licence holder name is also returned.

success.description: Whether the api call was successful

is_possible_taxi.description: Has the vehicle been previously used as a taxi.

possible_taxi_reason.description: The reason for the possible taxi status.

licence_start_date.description: The taxi and private hire licence start date.

licence_expiry_date.description: The taxi and private hire licence expiry date.

licence_holder_name.description: This field has been deprecated and will always return null.

error.example: If there is an error the message would go here
error.description: Details of what went wrong with the api call

get.summary: Valuation and Market Metrics from ID
get.description: This endpoint returns  four mileage adjusted valuations. By using the optional vehicle_condition parameter, valuations will also be condition adjusted. Additional metrics providing insight into market supply & demand, and market conditions are also returned.

parameters.name: autotrader_derivative_id
parameters.description: Auto Trader identifier for the derivative of the vehicle

parameters.name: vehicle_condition
parameters.description: Vehicle's condition (0-100 - where 0 is very poor and 100 is retail-ready)

parameters.name: advertised_price
parameters.description: The advertised price of the vehicle

parameters.name: post_code
parameters.description: Postcode for the area of interest. Use a comma separator for multiple postcode requests e.g RG303AT

success.description: Whether the api call was successful

vehicle_desc.example: MINI Convertible 1.5 Cooper Convertible 2dr Petrol Manual (s/s) (136 ps)

retail_valuation.description: The suggested market average retail valuation for the specified vehicle (cars only).

retail_valuation_ex_vat.description: The suggested market average retail valuation excluding vat for the specified vehicle (cars only).

private_valuation.description: The suggested market average private sale valuation for the specified vehicle (location, market and condition adjusted).

trade_valuation.description: The suggested market average trade valuation for the specified vehicle (location, market and condition adjusted).

part_exchange_valuation.description: The suggested market average part exchange valuation for the specified vehicle (location, market and condition adjusted).

market_supply.description: A comparison of the national market supply observed on Auto Trader over the last 7 days relative to the market supply that has been observed over the last 6 months (-0 to 1+) (-0: high supply, 1+: average-limited supply).

market_demand.description: A comparison of the national demand observed on Auto Trader over the last 7 days relative to the level of demand that has been observed over the last 6 months (-0 to 1+) (-0: low demand, 1+: average-high demand).

market_condition.description: Modelled number to illustrate current market condition based on Supply & Demand metrics (-0-1+) (-0: poor market condition, 1+: average-good market condition).

location_market_rating.description: Modelled metric of the potential retail performance of a vehicle based on the Days to Sell, Supply and Demand  for the given location (1-100) (1: poor performance, 100: good performance).

days_to_sell.description: The expected number of days it will take to sell the vehicle.

post_code.description: The location of the stock vehicle used as the centre of the search.

national_market_rating.description: The  modelled metric of the potential retail performance of a vehicle based on the Days to Sell, Supply and Demand at national level.

national_days_to_sell.description: The expected number of days it will take to sell the vehicle based on the chosen advertised price at national level.

error.example: If there is an error the message would go here
error.description: Details of what went wrong with the api call

get.summary: Valuation and Market Metrics from VRM
get.description: This endpoint returns four mileage adjusted valuations. By using the optional vehicle_condition parameter (0-100 - where 0 is very poor and 100 is retail-ready), the valuations will also be condition adjusted. Additional metrics providing insight into market supply & demand, market condition are also returned. Days to Sell and Location Market Rating are based on postcode and advertised price.

parameters.name: vehicle_condition
parameters.description: Vehicle's condition (0-100 - where 0 is very poor and 100 is retail-ready)

parameters.name: advertised_price
parameters.description: The advertised price of the vehicle

part_exchange_valuation.description: The suggested market average part exchange valuation for the specified vehicle (location, market and condition adjusted).

market_demand.description: A comparison of the national demand observed on Auto Trader over the last 7 days relative to the level of demand that has been observed over the last 6 months (-0 to 1+) (-0: low demand, 1+: average-high demand).

market_condition.description: Modelled number to illustrate current market condition based on Supply & Demand metrics (-0-1+) (-0: poor market condition, 1+: average-good market condition).
